https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eeewmhu0OP1yfhXA6xouH4nE0f9.jpg A compilation of four gay shorts from Sundance includes a story of a disturbed black teen trying to seduce a much older AIDS prevention counselor; and a story of high school seniors pondering end of school and the end of their secret love. 4 Shorts: First Date (2006), Raw Love [Amor crudo] (2008), Spokane (2004), The Young and Evil (2008). Boys Life 7
